backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no functions.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature update linking several frontend files and components with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries for many frontend source files defining pages, models, storage, billing utilities, and layout.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and applying base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
Computes sales totals, monthly data, and product/category breakdowns from bills and bill items.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/billing/amountInWords.ts: Converts numeric amounts into Indian currency words including rupees and paise.
frontend/src/billing/billNumber.ts: Generates sequential invoice numbers prefixed with the current year by checking existing bills.
frontend/src/billing/calc.ts: Provides pure functions for calculating item and bill totals with discount and GST.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimpleBar: Recharts bar chart component for monthly sales with tooltip and responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimpleCat: Pie chart displaying sales by category with labels, legend, and color mapping.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimplePro: Vertical bar chart showing sales by product with tooltips and responsive design.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper handling navigation visibility, rendering routed pages, and adding a footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Responsive navigation component providing mobile drawer and desktop tab navigation based on route state.
frontend/src/export/xlsxExport.ts: Exports bills and bill items into a CSV file and triggers a download.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor using the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalBills.ts: Fetches local bills and bill items from storage and exposes an invalidate helper.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/models/settings.ts: Defines settings model and default settings for company and backup preferences.
frontend/src/models/types.ts: Contains TypeScript interfaces for categories, items, bills, and bill items.
frontend/src/pages/BillPreviewPage.tsx: Displays a bill preview with options to print, download, or save the bill PDF.
frontend/src/pages/CreateBillPage.tsx: Bill creation form allowing item entry, totals calculation, and navigation to preview.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays analytics with summary cards and charts using locally stored bills and items.
frontend/src/pages/ExportBackupPage.tsx: Provides Excel export and backup options, filtering data by date ranges and saving manual backups.
frontend/src/pages/ItemsCategoriesPage.t: Manages item categories and items with CRUD dialogs, validation, and data persistence.
frontend/src/pages/SavedBillsPage.tsx: Lists saved bills with search, view, and PDF open actions using stored bill data.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Allows editing business settings, GST defaults, backup frequency, and uploading company assets.
frontend/src/pages/StartPage.tsx: Landing page introducing the app and linking to the dashboard with a branded UI.
frontend/src/pdf/generateBillPdf.ts: Builds an HTML-based bill layout using bill and settings data and returns it as a Blob for PDF-like output.
frontend/src/settings/useSettings.ts: React-query hook that loads settings from storage, provides update functionality, and exposes loading state.
frontend/src/storage/localDb.ts: Initializes and returns an IndexedDB database with object stores for categories, items, bills, billItems, and settings.
frontend/src/storage/repositories.ts: Provides CRUD functions for categories, items, bills, bill items, and settings using IndexedDB transactions.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Declares Vite env typings, including optional VITE_II_URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, architecture notes, requirements coverage, and known issues for the Mobile Receipt app.
